title: dhasharatha raamaaa
sahitya:
dasharatha rAma gOvinda nanu daya jUDu pAhi mukunda





anupallavi



 dasha muklha samhAra daraNIjApati rAma shashidhara pUjita shankha cakradhara





caraNam 1



 mI pAdamulE gati mAku mammElukO svAmi parAku mApAla 

galigina shrIpati I proddu kApADi rakSincu kanakAmbaradhara

   



caraNam 2



 nArAyaNa vAsudEva ninu nammiti mahAnubhAva garuDa 

gamana hari gaja rAja rakSaka parama puruSa bhakta pApa samharaNa

   



caraNam 3



 tArakanAma mantramu rAmadAulakella svatantramu iravuga 

krpanElumipuDu bhadrAdrini sthiramuga nelakonna sItA manOhara
